privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy - Human Version
privacy.paragraph1: Pokebattler Raid App requires 3rd party login information in order to store your Pokemon and settings for cross device use and to facilitate server side simulations.
privacy.paragraph2: Pokebattler does not connect to Niantic servers in any way. No personal information is retrieved or stored other than an identification number and/or email address which are securely store for login purposes and account troubleshooting. This data is not used for marketing or affiliate purposes in any way. Data such as trainer name and pokebox content is used to support sharing of urls, finding your friends and other site features. If you are concerned about your privacy, consider not entering your trainer name or the names of your Pokemon. Pokebattler does use 3rd party app usage collection services and bug collection (eg. Google Analytics/Stackdriver) to help know where to focus new feature development
privacy.paragraph3: Battler Empire, LLC built the Pokebattler website and  Pokebattler Raid Party app as a Freemium, Ad Supported app. This SERVICE is provided by Battler Empire, LLC at no cost and is intended for use as is.
privacy.paragraph4: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
privacy.paragraph5: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.paragraph6: For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Email Address. The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.
privacy.paragraph7: The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacy.paragraph8: Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app
privacy.paragraph9: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacy.paragraph10: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
privacy.paragraph11: This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacy.paragraph12: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacy.paragraph13: To facilitate our Service. To provide the Service on our behalf. To perform Service-related services. To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used. We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacy.paragraph14: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.paragraph15: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacy.paragraph16: These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.
privacy.paragraph17: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. pokebattler.title: Pokebattler Raid Party
pokebattler.description: Welcome to the Pokebattler Raid Party App. Designed to help you raid with confidence and minimal effort to defeat those raid bosses the first try. Pokebattler Raid Party App was created by Pokebattler.com to help organize and promote Pokemon Go raids by providing key features that are not provided by the game.
pokebattler.description2: Pokebattler.com is backed by a powerful set of servers in the cloud that allows for more sophisticated simulations that can be performed on a phone. It provides server side storage to help cross platform and cross app functionality including discord
pokebattler.cta: Invite your friends to download the app!
pokebattler.shareMessage: Come join raid parties with me!

pokeNav.title: PokeNav - Discord Bot
pokeNav.meta: A Pokemon Go Discord Bot for raiding, trading and more.
pokeNav.description: PokeNav is a 3rd Party Discord bot that integrates into the Pokebattler Raid Party apis. This allows you to create and communicate about a raid in Discord with deep links directly into the app.
pokeNav.description2: Players can join the raid in the app or in discord.
pokeNav.cta: Add PokeNav to your Discord Server
